concept.title: Planning Your Deployment
concept.shortdesc: To decide on your deployment's scope, determine the use case for your cloud. For example, will this be a small dev-test environment, or a large and scalable web services environment?

conbody.p: To help with scoping your deployment, we recommend you go to the Eucalyptus Reference Architectures page. There you will find the most popular use cases and the physical resources required.
